attributes.action: BAN AND TO MAKE IT ILLEGAL FOR MPS TO TAKE ANY POST OF DIRECTORSHIP WHILST SERVING THEIR CONSTITUENTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not need part timers politicians in Westminster.  We need full time MPs with no string attached to them and consequently, I undersigned petition the Prime Minister to come up with a bill banning MPs serving time as non executive directors whilst they are supposed to spend their time and energy on us not private companies in return for more personal gains. Enough is Enough of this personal greed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
